21901. To the Holy Land

England — Not random

Conditions

  • England owns Ile de France
  • Country is not at war

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1419
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after July 7, 1480)

Description

Near his death while the passage of the fifty-first psalm was being read King Henry V declared that after France was fully subdued there should be a crusade conducted against the infidels and that England should recover the Holy Land.

Actions

A. This is Utter Nonsense

  • +10 national manpower
  • Stability -1
  • -10 relations with Papal States

B. Send Out a Small Expedition

  • +25 relations with Papal States
  • Lose 7500 troops in a random province
  • -100

C. Yes, the Holy Land Shall Be Ours!

  • +75 relations with Papal States
  • +75 relations with Venice
  • +75 relations with Byzantium
  • +75 relations with Order of St. John
  • +25 victory points
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Mamluks for 600 months
  • Gain 10 transports in Osel
  • -600

Back to top

201990. Fall of Constantinople

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Ottoman Empire controls Byzantion

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1419
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1570)

Description

Constantinople, long our bulwark against the East, has fallen. We have the chance to declare a crusade, a holy war...

Actions

A. Encourage Other Nations to Crusade

  • -20 relations with Ottoman Empire
  • -20 relations with Mamluks
  • -20 relations with Morocco
  • -20 relations with Fez
  • -20 relations with Algeria
  • -20 relations with Hedjaz
  • -20 relations with Tunisia
  • -20 relations with Granada
  • -20 relations with Dulkadir
  • +20 relations with Persia
  • Event 201991 - Reconquest of County of Tripoli (Lebanon) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201992 - Reconquest of County of Edessa (Aleppo) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201993 - Reconquest of Samaria (Sidon, Tyre, and Acre) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201994 - Reconquest of Judea (Jaffa, Ascalon, and Jerusalem) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201995 - Reconquest of Outremer for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201997 - End of Internal Strife in Outremer for Order of St. John will never fire

B. Let there be Peace with Muslim nations

  • +20 relations with Ottoman Empire
  • +20 relations with Mamluks
  • +20 relations with Morocco
  • +20 relations with Fez
  • +20 relations with Algeria
  • +20 relations with Hedjaz
  • +20 relations with Tunisia
  • +20 relations with Granada
  • -20 relations with Persia
  • Event 201991 - Reconquest of County of Tripoli (Lebanon) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201992 - Reconquest of County of Edessa (Aleppo) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201993 - Reconquest of Samaria (Sidon, Tyre, and Acre) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201994 - Reconquest of Judea (Jaffa, Ascalon, and Jerusalem) for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201995 - Reconquest of Outremer for Order of St. John will never fire
  • Event 201997 - End of Internal Strife in Outremer for Order of St. John will never fire

C. Let there be War with the Infidel

  • -200 relations with Ottoman Empire
  • -200 relations with Mamluks
  • -200 relations with Morocco
  • -200 relations with Fez
  • -200 relations with Algeria
  • -200 relations with Hedjaz
  • -200 relations with Tunisia
  • -200 relations with Granada
  • -200 relations with Dulkadir
  • -200 relations with Persia
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Ottoman Empire for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Morocco for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Fez for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Algeria for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Hedjaz for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Tunisia for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Granada for 1200 months
  • Gain a temporary casus belli against Persia for 1200 months
  • Filistin will be considered a claim province
  • Beyrut will be considered a claim province
  • Antakya will be considered a claim province
  • Halep will be considered a claim province
  • +50 relations with France
  • +50 relations with England
  • +50 relations with Spain
  • +50 relations with Portugal
  • +50 relations with Papal States
  • +50 relations with Austria
  • +50 relations with Castile
  • +50 relations with Hungary
  • +50 relations with Aragon
  • Fortress level in the capital province +1

201992. Reconquest of County of Edessa (Aleppo)

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John has already occurred
  • Own Halep

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1420
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1571)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John

Description

The Knights have reconquered the County of Edessa (Aleppo). There is certain to be unrest as we are foreign invaders with a far different culture and religion than many of the inhabitants.

Actions

A. Praise the Lord!

  • +10 victory points
  • -2000 population in Halep
  • Lose bailiff in Halep
  • Revolt risk value in Halep +6

Back to top

201991. Reconquest of County of Tripoli (Lebanon)

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John has already occurred
  • Own Antakya
  • Control Antakya

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1420
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1571)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John

Description

The Knights have reconquered the County of Tripoli (Lebanon), shall we relocate to Lebanon? There is certain to be unrest as we are foreign invaders with a far different culture and religion than many of the inhabitants.

Actions

A. Keep our capital

  • +10 victory points
  • Stability +3
  • Centralization +1
  • -2000 population in Antakya
  • Lose bailiff in Antakya
  • Revolt risk value in Antakya +6

B. Move to Beirut

  • +10 victory points
  • Move capital to Antakya
  • Antakya will be considered a claim province
  • Fortress level in Antakya +1
  • Stability -2
  • Centralization -1
  • -2000 population in Antakya
  • Lose bailiff in Antakya
  • Revolt risk value in Antakya +6

Back to top

201994. Reconquest of Judea (Jaffa, Ascalon, and Jerusalem)

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John has already occurred
  • Own Filistin

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1420
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1571)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John

Description

The Knights have reconquered Judea, including Caesarea, Jaffa, Ascalon, Gaza, Kerak, and the Holy City of Jerusalem. There is certain to be unrest as we are foreign invaders with a far different culture and religion than many of the inhabitants.

Actions

A. Praise the Lord!

  • +50 victory points
  • -2000 population in Filistin
  • Lose bailiff in Filistin
  • Revolt risk value in Filistin +6

201995. Reconquest of Outremer

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Own Halep
  • Own Antakya
  • Own Beyrut
  • Own Filistin

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1420
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1571)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John

Description

The Knights have reconquered the Old Crusader Kingdom of Outremer, including the County of Edessa (Aleppo), County of Tripoli (Lebanon), Sidon, Tyre, Acre (Samaria), Caesarea, Jaffa, Ascalon, Gaza, Kerak, and the Holy City of Jerusalem (in Judea). Money is flowing in from European nations and from the Papacy, ostensibly to fund pilgrims and missionaries. Let us show the temperance and wisdom which our forbears did not. But let us also re-fortify Acre, Jerusalem, and our former castles of Margat and Krak des Chevaliers.

Actions

A. Praise the Lord!

  • +80 victory points
  • +800
  • -200 relations with Ottoman Empire
  • -200 relations with Mamluks
  • -200 relations with Morocco
  • -200 relations with Fez
  • -200 relations with Algeria
  • -200 relations with Hedjaz
  • -200 relations with Tunisia
  • -200 relations with Granada
  • -200 relations with Persia
  • +50 relations with Cyprus
  • +50 relations with France
  • +50 relations with England
  • +50 relations with Spain
  • +50 relations with Portugal
  • +50 relations with Papal States
  • +50 relations with Austria
  • +50 relations with Castile
  • +50 relations with Hungary
  • +50 relations with Aragon
  • +50 relations with Venice
  • +50 relations with Auvergne
  • +50 relations with Provence
  • +8000 infantry in a random province
  • +2000 cavalry in a random province
  • Fortress level in Filistin +1

Back to top

201993. Reconquest of Samaria (Sidon, Tyre, and Acre)

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Own Beyrut

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1420
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1571)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John

Description

The Knights have reconquered Samaria (Sidon, Tyre, and Acre). There is certain to be unrest as we are foreign invaders with a far different culture and religion than many of the inhabitants.

Actions

A. Praise the Lord!

  • Revolt risk value in Beyrut +6

201996. Kingdom of Jerusalem

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Own Filistin
  • Control Filistin
  • Event 201995 - Reconquest of Outremer for Order of St. John has already occurred

Will happen within 1 days of January 2, 1480
Checked again every 1 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1599)

Description

Following the reconquest of the Holy City of Jerusalem, the Knights have been put under tremendous pressure from Europe to re-instate the Kingdom of Jerusalem.

Actions

A. Coordinate the defense of Jerusalem from our current location

  • Beyrut will be considered a claim province
  • Antakya will be considered a claim province
  • Filistin will be considered a claim province
  • +100 relations with Cyprus
  • +50 relations with France
  • +50 relations with England
  • +75 relations with Spain
  • +75 relations with Portugal
  • +50 relations with Papal States
  • +50 relations with Austria
  • +75 relations with Castile
  • +50 relations with Hungary
  • +75 relations with Aragon
  • +25 relations with Venice

B. Proclaim Ourselves the Kingdom of Jerusalem

  • Become Jerusalem
  • Hayastan will be considered a claim province
  • Halep will be considered a claim province
  • Antakya will be considered a claim province
  • Beyrut will be considered a claim province
  • Filistin will be considered a claim province
  • Move capital to Filistin
  • Stability -2
  • -100
  • -100 relations with Cyprus
  • +50 relations with France
  • +50 relations with England
  • +25 relations with Spain
  • +25 relations with Portugal
  • +100 relations with Papal States
  • +50 relations with Austria
  • +25 relations with Castile
  • +50 relations with Hungary
  • +25 relations with Aragon
  • +75 relations with Venice

C. Sadly, We cannot defend it

  • Stability +1
  • -20 relations with France
  • -20 relations with England
  • -100 relations with Papal States
  • -20 relations with Austria
  • -20 relations with Hungary
  • -20 relations with Venice

Back to top

201997. End of Internal Strife in Outremer

Order of St. John — Not random

Conditions

  • Event 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John has already occurred
  • At least one of the following must occur:
    • Own Halep
    • Own Antakya
    • Own Beyrut
    • Own Filistin

Will happen within 360 days of January 2, 1600
Checked again every 360 days until trigger is met (cannot happen after January 2, 1610)
unless prevented by
Action A, B of 201990 - Fall of Constantinople for Order of St. John

Description

Order of St. John presence in Outremer is now a consolidated reality. Obviously we can't leave local religious customs out of consideration, otherwise we will surely have to face new internal hostilities.

Actions

A. Praise the Lord!

  • Revolt risk value in Halep -6
  • Revolt risk value in Antakya -6
  • Revolt risk value in Beyrut -6
  • Revolt risk value in Filistin -6
